pi.somadasa , nagarika manthri nalin siriwardhana yana mahathwaru mema awasthawata ekwemin abesundara mahatha agayimata lak kalaha.mahinda abesundara mahathage ada siyawasaka madhya mehewara pilibandawa agayamin kattabuwagama wipepala kumarasinha mahatha wisin rachitha samaru githaya wisharada lasantha rathnayaka mahathage sangithayen nithignya dimuthu bandara mahatha wisin mehi di idiripath karanu labiya.me athara shri lanka guwan widuli sansthawe rajarata sewaye prem ranjith wijewikrama mahatha wisin idiripath karanu labu gi rasawindana wadasatahana prasada pranama ulela warnawath kaleya.mahinda abesundara mahathage ada siyawasaka madhya diwiya pilibandawa madhyawedi kithsiri wanasinha mahatha wisin rachitha ‘ wimasana pitapatha” kruthiya piliganwima da mehi di sidu kerini.anathuruwa samaru githaya athulath sidi thatiya nithignya dimuthu bandara mahatha wisin abesundara mahatha wetha piliganwanu labiya.nuwara kalawiya nidahas madhya padanama mangin pirinamana lada “ samaru thilinaya” sanwidhanaye sabhapathi chulabandara kulasekara, palath marga sanwardhana adhikariye samanyadhikari senarath pushpakumara mahathwarun athin piliganwanu labu athara, nagarika manthri nalin siriwardhana ha nachchaduwa pradeshiya lekam je. dab. es. kithsiri yana mahathwaru da mema awasthawata ek wuha.shri lanka guwan widuli sansthawe sinhala sewa adhyaksha nithignya gamini wijewardhana mahatha wisin madhyawedin wenuwen wu deshanaya idiripath kala athara , rajya niladharin,athulu wishala pirisak mema awasthawata ek wuha..

eeta passe ara kolla magaarinna maga arinna uu passe wadawatila yanawa.uuta adala na, tika kalekin kellata aadare kiyana de epa wenawa, anna eeta passe kisi ekek ekka yalunowi innawa hamoma aadare illadi,aadare karanna baye innawa, ohoma idala dawasaka kollek ekka yaluwenawa,uuta aaye aadare karanawa,ithin awankakamata kella una hamadema ee kollata kiyanawa,onna othanin thama eelaga kathawa iwarawenne, kisi ekek kamathi na ekek hapu kuburaka wapuranna,eeka piriminge sobawaya,uuth ara aadare kiyana de hithin ayin karanawa,sapa ganna kellawa thiyagannawa,kaleth ekka ekma kamajathiya kala uutath epa wenawa uuth dala yanawa, ethanin ehata ee kellage kathawa iwarayi,ekko wate yanawa naththan sada thanikadayi,oya athara innawa ban raththaran minissu awankawa una waradi walata samawadila kellata aadare karanna hithana.
